title: Some Seedlings pictures - help with dates please

posts.content:
Here are a few Seedlings pictures from days gone by.

Duck & Huddle at BVF



Early days at Victoria Farm -Seedlings tent



At BVF the children (Seedlings) spent ages sat round making a model van for a competition, the front was demonstrated by Matthew (aged 4 months), Steve and Amanda.



Royal Birthday Party - fancy dress. Golden Jubilee celebrations by the Seedlings. Every child attending received a set of special stamps.





Will post some more later
Terry

I think this is BVF, the Seedlings worked very hard to raise enough money to buy this playchute (I had to put loads into it as Amanda was really worried they would not be able to afford it!!). They sold raffle tickets to SSVC and T2OC members. Amanda liked the idea of rainbow colours and also got balls, a book of games etc to go with it. Shame I have not seen it in years now, the children loved playing with it.





Playing at Whitenoise (I think?)


Victoria Farm fun and games. I can't find any pictures of the girls team (it took me ages to scan these pictures as they were all taken before I had a digital camera)


Last for tonight. Whacky Races
These pickup vans were the key to the games (adults teams not children) the children played with them later when all the balloons filled with flour and water had been used by the adults trying to go through hoops!! Ann and Paul Edwards made the vans and I think it is Hollie Eccles on Amanda's shoulders in this picture.



Fun days
Terry
Top photo has Leah and Joel Hunt 20 years ago?

I have now counted the candles on the cake and there are 6 which would make it 1991.

I spied the king of tieland in the fancy dress and was it the queen of hearts or tarts (I seem to remember a plate of jam tarts)?

oh my god what a picture! Thankfully my glasses have improved greatly in 18 years! I'd of been about 7 and joel 5 then, mum and dad must have some at home especially ones of my birthday party at drayton manor with my pink split cake!

Terry wrote:I have now counted the candles on the cake and there are 6 which would make it 1991.

I spied the king of tieland in the fancy dress and was it the queen of hearts or tarts (I seem to remember a plate of jam tarts)?
Are you sure on the date. Top photo it looks like Amy on the right, but she was born '93

thats me deep in converstaion with Russ D.and yes its Hollie on Amandas shoulders..
have got a load here from very early 90s...New Forest..Leisure Lakes...Forest of Dean
just need some time to scan
oh and learn about uploading onto the forum!

Does anyone have any photos from the early days of the seedlings?
I could do with them for something we are trying to get together for the activities at the AGM!
Or anyone who was a seedlings in the early days who would like to do a 'where are they now?'
Get in touch with me or email the seedlings email! Thanks, Reece - seedlings mag editor
